author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of the trade union of the Socialist Democratic Party of India staged a protest near the Red Cross Junction on Tuesday demanding nationally valid identity card for platform vendors. Led by the district president of the auto rickshaw drivers’ wing A. Hakkim, the protesters said that the Tamil Nadu should follow the example set by Karnataka in giving the identity cards to the vendors.

Constitute committees

But before that it should constitute committees in all district to identify and collect the details of the vendors. Around 50 persons participated in the protest.
title: SDPI stages protest
